title: 333. Q&AF: Healthy Comparisons For Growth, Taking Care Of Employees During Inflation & Redirecting When Working Towards Your Goals
itunes:title: 333. Q&AF: Healthy Comparisons For Growth, Taking Care Of Employees During Inflation & Redirecting When Working Towards Your Goals
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how you should be utilizing comparisons when working towards your goals, what's the best way to take care of your employees during challenging economic times, and how to course-correct on your journey to success.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how you should be utilizing comparisons when working towards your goals, what's the best way to take care of your employees during challenging economic times, and how to course-correct on your journey to success.
